vialab.SMT.util

Class SystemAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • vialab.SMT.util.SystemAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ComponentListener, java.util.EventListener

    public class SystemAdapter
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.ComponentListener
    A utility class for getting system and processing info.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SystemAdapter()
      Create a new system adapter that is not bound to a sketch
      SystemAdapter(processing.core.PApplet applet)
      Create a new system adapter that is bound to the specified sketch
